name: Secrets of Ailzylia
description:
A pixel melee combat game with PVP, adventure, and variety modes!

Inspired by the "Souls" series and Zelda: Link to the Past

 

  • Explore "archstone" style worlds and defeat bosses
  • Search for new weapons and spells 
  • Online PVP with 10 players per world
  • Variety of mini-game modes
  • High consistent difficulty
  • Unique enemy AI personalities

Things you can do in the current demo 

  • PvP (Castle area)
  • PvE Survival mode
  • PvP Royale mode

 

Several weapons/specials are immediately available for testing 

If you're here you probably follow my Twitch & I just wanna say thanks for supporting my projects by checking them out. It means a lot! <3
